item.description: Thursday, November 17, is the 36th Great American Smokeout. Millions of smokers are expected to quit for the day or for much longer, especially if they use modern cessation methods, such as hypnosis. If you are ready to live life smoke-free, attend an educational seminar on a guaranteed safe and effective way to stop smoking.  Learn why people have a difficult time stopping smoking and how hypnosis can help people with both the mental and physical aspects of the habit.  Learn about techniques that are available to manage cravings once and for all. Enjoy a very relaxing group hypnosis session. Bring a pillow, mat and blanket, if desired. Preregistration required. Contact  Weymouth High School Adult Ed directly. http://www.weymouthschools.org/uploadedFiles/District_Content/Teaching_and_Learning/Adult%20Ed%20Brochure%20Fall%202011.pdf

group.name: Past Life Regression & Professional Hypnosis Group

item.name: Great American Smokeout; Stop Smoking with Hypnosis
